hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: When three are on a journey, they should appoint one of them as their commander. Nafi' said: We said to AbuSalamah: You are our commander

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْقَوْمِ يُسَافِرُونَ يُؤَمِّرُونَ أَحَدَهُمْ
chapter.eng-name: A Group Of People Traveling Together Putting One Of Them In Charge
